about_the_game:
Overview

Exploit the art of stock car drafting and aerodynamics to overtake your competition. Strategically place your car to gain speed, disrupt your competition and navigate a straight-line dash to the finish in this action-filled Motorsports arcade racer. Precision maneuvers, strategic thinking and quick reflexes are required to secure victory. With realistic physics tweaking, great visuals, and intense gameplay, DRAFTYCAR offers a racing experience like no other.

Mechanics

Tune 13 different parameters to your liking to create challenging, fun, and dynamic experiences.

Race the Clock

Each session is timed. Climb the Steam leaderboard for the best winning time and most career wins.

Indie Developer

DRAFTYCAR was developed by one person. We appreciate your patience as we work on new features and fix bugs. Join our Discord below to submit feedback and get help from the community. By supporting DRAFTYCAR, you're helping us achieve our goal to make this game multiplayer, as well as creating the foundation for more racing games in the future!

In Development

We are working to add a paint scheme selection tool so you can run any paint scheme in the game.

Join Our Community

short_description: DRAFTYCAR is a fast-paced racing game simulating the art of professional stockcar drafting. Tweak the physics to your liking and immerse yourself in pursuit of victory. Strategically place your car to gain speed, disrupt your competition and navigate a high-speed drag race to the finish.
